subject: Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former Godolphin trainer Mahmood al-Zarooni has withdrawn an appeal against his eight-year worldwide ban for doping racehorses at his stables in Newmarket, England.
snippet: The former Godolphin trainer Mahmood al-Zarooni has withdrawn an appeal against his eight-year worldwide ban for doping racehorses at his stables in Newmarket, England.
